snippet.title: Nordhold: Origins - Free Prologue Launch Trailer | Tower Defense meets Strategy & Roguelite
snippet.description:
🔔 Wishlist on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3086510/Nordhold_Origins/?utm_source=youtube

👾 Join our Discord: 
https://www.discord.com/invite/U39vzad494

📅 Release Date: 
End of August

Get ready for the ultimate tower defense experience with Nordhold: Origins! Watch our official launch trailer and immerse yourself in this unique blend of tower defense, roguelite mechanics, and turn-based strategy. Build and defend your medieval Nordic village, customize your towers, and face epic battles with strategic depth. The free prologue is coming to Steam at the end of August – don’t miss out!

Key Features:

- Available for PC, Mac, Linux
- Procedurally Generated Landscapes
- Hero and Tower Synergies
- Customizable Towers and Upgrades
- 14 different Buildings
- Unique Progression System inside the Game
- Challenging 20 Waves of Enemies
- Global Leaderboard
& alot more to come!

Subscribe for more updates and gameplay videos. Share your thoughts in the comments and join the Nordhold community today!

#NordholdOrigins #TowerDefense #Roguelite #StrategyGames #IndieGame #GameTrailer #SteamGames #NordicVillage #FreePrologue #GamingCommunity
